content:
FYI @Tim Abbott @Mateusz Mandera @Anders Kaseorg I was able to upgrade from 2.1.0 to 2.1.2 without any problem this morning.
Without changing anything about the RAM affected to the virtual host concerned (2GB only).
It seems there was an issue somewhere in the 2.1.1 release.
In any case, thanks a lot for your help @Tim Abbott @Mateusz Mandera @Anders Kaseorg ! :-)
